titles.title: To amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to provide for an increase in the authorization of appropriations for community-based family resource and support grants under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 5/6/1999--Introduced. Amends the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to authorize increased appropriations for community-based family resource and support grants for FY 2000 through 2004.
